short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows for editing on the teamsheet page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This will allow you to remove players from a team sheet & add a number to players.

To Remove a play from the team sheet you need to click on the photo

To add a number click on the number box 

To add all players back to the page click on the table header
